description.english: Get shot while carrying an explosive barrel.
description.german: Werde angeschossen während du ein explosives Fass trägst.
description.french: Se faire tirer dessus en transportant un baril d'explosif.
description.italian: Fatti sparare mentre trasporti un barile esplosivo.
description.spanish: Recibe un disparo mientras llevas un barril explosivo.
description.schinese: 携带爆炸桶时中弹。
description.tchinese: 攜帶爆炸桶時中彈。
description.russian: Получить выстрел, когда герой несет бочку взрывчатки.
description.japanese: たる爆弾を運搬中に撃たれる
description.polish: Daj się zastrzelić, niosąc wybuchową beczkę.
description.brazilian: Receba um tiro enquanto estiver carregando um barril explosivo.

description.english: Visit Takuma in his tower in Ōsaka Castle.
description.german: Besuche Takuma in seinem Turm in Schloss Ōsaka
description.french: Rendre visite à Takuma sur sa tour du Château d'Ōsaka.
description.italian: Visita Takuma sulla sua torre nel Castello di Ōsaka.
description.koreana: 오사카성에 있는 다쿠마의 탑에서 그를 만나십시오.
description.spanish: Visita a Takuma en su torre del castillo de Osaka.
description.schinese: 拜访大阪城塔楼中的琢磨。
description.tchinese: 拜訪大阪城塔樓中的琢磨。
description.russian: Навестить Такуму в его башне в Осакском замке.
description.japanese: 大阪城のタクマに会う
description.polish: Odwiedź Takumę na jego wieży w zamku Ōsaka.
description.turkish: Takuma'yı Ōsaka Kalesi'ndeki kulesinde ziyaret et.
description.brazilian: Visite Takuma na torre no castelo de Osaka.

description.english: Use Hayato's stone to rescue Mugen in Ōsaka Castle.
description.german: Benutze Hayatos Stein in Schloss Ōsaka um Mugen zu retten.
description.french: Utiliser la pierre de Hayato pour sauver Mugen au Château d'Ōsaka.
description.italian: Usa la pietra di Hayato per salvare Mugen nel Castello di Ōsaka.
description.koreana: 오사카성에서 하야토의 돌을 사용해 무겐을 구출하십시오.
description.spanish: Usa la piedra de Hayato para rescatar a Mugen en el castillo de Osaka.
description.schinese: 使用隼人的石块营救大阪城的无限。
description.tchinese: 使用隼人的石塊營救大阪城的無限。
description.russian: Использовать камень Хаято для спасения Мугена в Осакском замке.
description.japanese: 大阪城でハヤトの石でムゲンを救出
description.polish: Użyj kamieni Hayata, by uratować Mugena w zamku Ōsaka.
description.turkish: Mugen'i Ōsaka Kalesi'nden kurtarmak için Hayato'nun taşını  kullan.
description.brazilian: Use a pedra de Hayato para resgatar Mugen no castelo de Osaka.

description.english: Kill 3 guards with the planks hanging from the Yagura Mon.
description.german: Töte 3 Wachen mit den Planken die vom Yagura Mon hängen.
description.french: Tuer 3 gardes avec les planches qui dépassent du Yagura Mon.
description.italian: Uccidi 3 guardie con le assi sospese sullo Yagura Mon.
description.spanish: Mata a 3 guardias con los tablones que cuelgan del Yagura Mon.
description.schinese: 使用橹山上悬挂的模板杀死三个守卫。
description.tchinese: 使用櫓山上懸掛的範本殺死三個守衛。
description.russian: Убить 3 стражников планками, свисающими с ворот ягура-мон.
description.japanese: 3人の見張りをやぐら門の板で倒す
description.polish: Zabij 3 strażników za pomocą desek zwisających z Yagura Mon.
description.turkish: Yagura Mon'a kalas asılıyken 3 muhafız öldür.
description.brazilian: Mate 3 guardas com as tábuas que pendem de Yagura Mon.

description.english: Find the smiling creature in a little cave on the Nakasendō.
description.german: Finde die lächelnde Kreatur in einer kleinen Höhle auf dem Nakasendō.
description.french: Trouver la créature souriante dans une petite caverne sur la Nakasendō.
description.italian: Trova la creatura sorridente in una piccola caverna sul Nakasendō.
description.koreana: 나카센도의 작은 동굴에서 미소 짓는 생명체를 찾으십시오.
description.spanish: Encuentra a la criatura sonriente en una pequeña cueva de la ruta Nakasendō.
description.schinese: 找到中山道的一个小洞穴里的微笑生物。
description.tchinese: 找到中山道的一個小洞穴裡的微笑生物。
description.russian: Найти улыбающееся существо в маленькой пещере в Накасэндо.
description.japanese: 中山道の洞窟で笑う生き物を見つける
description.polish: Znajdź uśmiechnięte stworzenie w małej jaskini przy trakcie Nakasendō.
description.turkish: Nakasendō'daki küçük mağarada gülen yaratığı bul.
description.brazilian: Encontre a criatura sorridente em uma pequena caverna em Nakasendo.

description.english: Cause 3 accidents on the Nakasendō road.
description.german: Verursache 3 Unfälle auf der Straße nach Nakasendō.
description.french: Causer 3 accidents sur la route Nakasendō.
description.italian: Causa 3 incidenti sulla strada di Nakasendō.
description.spanish: Causa 3 accidentes en la ruta Nakasendō.
description.schinese: 在中山道上引起3起事故。
description.tchinese: 在中山道上引起3起事故。
description.russian: Подстроить 3 несчастных случая на тракте Накасэндо.
description.japanese: 中山道で3つの事故を起こす
description.turkish: Nakasendō yolunda 3 kez kazaya yol aç.
description.brazilian: Provoque 3 acidentes na rodovia Nakasendo.

description.english: Kill a guard with an ox.
description.german: Töte eine Wache mit einem Rind.
description.french: Tuer un garde avec un bœuf.
description.italian: Uccidi una guardia con un bue.
description.spanish: Mata a un guardia con un buey.
description.schinese: 使用牛杀死守卫。
description.tchinese: 使用牛殺死守衛。
description.russian: Убить стражника при помощи быка.
description.japanese: 見張りを牛で倒す
description.brazilian: Mate um guarda com um boi.

description.english: Pickpocket someone with Yuki.
description.german: Bestehle jemanden mit Yuki.
description.french: Faire les poches de quelqu'un avec Yuki.
description.italian: Borseggia qualcuno con Yuki.
description.spanish: Róbale a alguien con Yuki.
description.schinese: 让友希扒窃某人。
description.tchinese: 讓友希扒竊某人。
description.russian: Обчистить чьи-нибудь карманы с помощью Юки.
description.japanese: ユキを使ってスリをする
description.turkish: Yuki ile birinden bir şey aşır.
description.brazilian: Furte alguém com Yuki.

description.english: Hide in the wagon in Imai town.
description.german: Verstecke dich im Wagen in Imai.
description.french: Se cacher dans le chariot à Imai.
description.italian: Nasconditi nel carrello presso la città di Imai.
description.spanish: Escóndete en el carro en el pueblo de Imai.
description.schinese: 藏在今井镇的红色马车里。
description.tchinese: 藏在今井鎮的紅色馬車裡。
description.russian: Спрятаться в повозке в городе Имаи.
description.japanese: 今井町で荷馬車に隠れる
description.polish: Ukryj się na wozie w mieście Imai.
description.brazilian: Esconda-se na carroça na cidade de Imai.

description.english: Kill a samurai with an icicle.
description.german: Töte einen Samurai mit einem Eiszapfen.
description.french: Tuer un Samouraï avec une stalactite.
description.italian: Uccidi un samurai con una stalattite.
description.spanish: Mata a un samurái con un carámbano.
description.schinese: 利用落下的冰锥杀死一名武士。
description.tchinese: 利用落下的冰錐殺死一名武士。
description.russian: Убить самурая сосулькой.
description.japanese: つららで侍を殺す
description.brazilian: Mate um samurai com um cristal de gelo.

description.english: Help Takuma escape from Mount Tsuru.
description.german: Hilf Takuma vom Tsuru zu fliehen.
description.french: Aider Takuma à s'enfuir du Mont Tsuru.
description.italian: Aiuta Takuma a fuggire dal Monte Tsuru.
description.koreana: 다쿠마가 쓰루 산에서 도망칠 수 있게 도와주십시오.
description.spanish: Ayuda a Takuma a huir del monte Tsuru.
description.schinese: 帮助琢磨逃离都留山。
description.tchinese: 幫助琢磨逃離都留山。
description.russian: Помочь Такуме бежать с горы Цуру.
description.japanese: 鶴山からタクマを救出
description.polish: Pomóż Takumie uciec z góry Tsuru.
description.turkish: Takuma'nın Tsuru Dağı'ndan kaçmasına yardım et.
description.brazilian: Ajude Takuma a escapar do Monte Tsuru.

description.english: Kill a guard by throwing a rock with Mugen.
description.german: Töte eine Wache, indem du Mugen einen Stein werfen lässt.
description.french: Tuer un garde en lançant un rocher avec Mugen.
description.italian: Uccidi una guardia scagliando una roccia con Mugen.
description.spanish: Mata a un guardia lanzándole una roca con Mugen.
description.schinese: 让无限扔石头砸死一个守卫。
description.tchinese: 讓無限扔石頭砸死一個守衛。
description.russian: Убить стражника, приказав Мугену швырнуть камень.
description.japanese: ムゲンで岩を投げて見張りを倒す
description.polish: Zabij strażnika głazem rzuconym przez Mugena.
description.turkish: Mugen ile bir kaya fırlatarak bir muhafızı öldür.
description.brazilian: Mate um guarda jogando uma pedra com Mugen.

description.english: Put on Aiko's disguise.
description.german: Zieh Aiko ihre Verkleidung an.
description.french: Enfiler le déguisement d'Aiko.
description.italian: Fai indossare un travestimento ad Aiko.
description.spanish: Ponte el disfraz de Aiko.
description.schinese: 穿上爱子的伪装。
description.tchinese: 穿上愛子的偽裝。
description.russian: Надеть костюм Аико.
description.japanese: アイコで変装する
description.brazilian: Ponha o disfarce de Aiko.

description.english: Kill Lord Yabu in his estate.
description.german: Töte Fürst Yabu in seinem Anwesen.
description.french: Tuer le Seigneur Yabu dans son domaine.
description.italian: Uccidi Lord Yabu nella sua tenuta.
description.spanish: Mata a lord Yabu en su finca.
description.schinese: 在领主雅布的庄园内杀死他。
description.tchinese: 在領主雅布的莊園內殺死他。
description.russian: Убить господина Ябу в его имении.
description.japanese: ヤブ邸でヤブ大名を殺す
description.polish: Zabij lorda Yabu w jego posiadłości.
description.brazilian: Mate lorde Yabu na mansão dele.

description.english: Kill General Okkoto prematurely in Hida village.
description.german: Töte General Okkoto vorzeitig in Hida.
description.french: Tuer prématurément le Général Okkoto dans le village de Hida.
description.italian: Uccidi prematuramente il Generale Okkoto nel villaggio di Hida.
description.koreana: 히다 마을에서 오코토 장군을 일찍 처치하십시오.
description.spanish: Mata al general Okkoto antes de tiempo en la aldea de Hida.
description.schinese: 在飞驒村里提前杀死乙事将军。
description.tchinese: 在飛驒村裡提前殺死乙事將軍。
description.russian: Раньше времени убить генерала Оккото в деревне Хида.
description.japanese: オッコト大将を前もって飛騨村で殺す
description.polish: Zabij przedwcześnie generała Okkoto w wiosce Hida.
description.turkish: General Okkoto'yu Hida köyünde erkenden öldür.
description.brazilian: Mate prematuramente o general Okkoto na Aldeia de Hida.

description.english: Free Mugen in Suganuma village.
description.german: Befreie Mugen in Suganuma.
description.french: Libérer Mugen dans le village de Suganuma.
description.italian: Libera Mugen nel villaggio di Suganuma.
description.spanish: Libera a Mugen en la aldea de Suganuma.
description.schinese: 在菅沼村释放无限。
description.tchinese: 在菅沼村釋放無限。
description.russian: Освободить Мугена в деревне Суганума.
description.japanese: 菅沼村でムゲンを解放する
description.brazilian: Liberte Mugen na Aldeia de Suganuma.

description.english: Kill General Okkoto with an explosive barrel.
description.german: Töte General Okkoto mit einem explosiven Fass.
description.french: Tuer le Général Okkoto avec un baril d'explosif.
description.italian: Uccidi il Generale Okkoto con un barile esplosivo.
description.spanish: Mata al general Okkoto con un barril explosivo.
description.schinese: 用炸药桶杀死乙事将军。
description.tchinese: 用炸藥桶殺死乙事將軍。
description.russian: Убить генерала Оккото бочкой взрывчатки.
description.japanese: たる爆弾でオッコト大将を倒す
description.polish: Zabij generała Okkoto za pomocą wybuchowej beczki.
description.brazilian: Mate o general Okkoto com um barril explosivo.

description.english: Free the prisoners in Kanazawa Castle.
description.german: Befreie die Gefangenen in Schloss Kanazawa.
description.french: Libérer les prisonniers du Château de Kanazawa.
description.italian: Libera i prigionieri nel Castello di Kanazawa.
description.spanish: Libera a los prisioneros en el castillo de Kanazawa.
description.schinese: 在金泽城释放囚犯。
description.tchinese: 在金澤城釋放囚犯。
description.russian: Освободить пленников в замке Каназава.
description.japanese: 囚人を解放する
description.brazilian: Liberte os prisioneiros no castelo de Kanazawa.

description.english: End General Okkoto's rebellion.
description.german: Beende General Okkotos Rebellion.
description.french: Mettre un terme à la rébellion du Général Okkoto.
description.italian: Poni fine alla ribellione del Generale Okkoto.
description.spanish: Pon fin a la rebelión del general Okkoto.
description.schinese: 结束乙事将军的叛乱。
description.tchinese: 結束乙事將軍的叛亂。
description.russian: Подавить мятеж генерала Оккото.
description.japanese: オッコトの反乱を終わらせる
description.brazilian: Dê um fim à rebelião do general Okkoto.

description.english: Shoot Kage-sama with Takuma in Kage-sama's hideout.
description.german: Erschieße Kage-sama mit Takuma in Kage-samas Versteck.
description.french: Tirer sur Kage-sama avec Takuma dans la cachette de Kage-sama.
description.italian: Spara Kage-sama con Takuma nel nascondiglio di Kage-Sama.
description.koreana: 그림자 대공의 은신처에서 다쿠마로 그를 쏘십시오.
description.spanish: Dispara a Kage-sama con Takuma en la guarida de Kage-sama.
description.schinese: 在影大人的藏身之处使用琢磨射击他。
description.tchinese: 在影大人的藏身之處使用琢磨射擊他。
description.russian: Приказать Такуме застрелить Каге-саму в его убежище.
description.japanese: あじとにいるカゲサマをタクマで撃ちぬく
description.polish: Zastrzel Kage-samę w jego ryjówce, kierując Takumą.
description.turkish: Kage-sama'yı kendi sığınağında Takuma ile vur.
description.brazilian: Com Takuma, atire no Kage-sama no esconderijo dele.

description.english: Reclaim all your equipment on your second visit to Mount Tsuru.
description.german: Beschaffe deine gesamte Ausrüstung bei deinem zweiten besuch des Tsuru wieder.
description.french: Récupérer tout votre équipement lors de votre seconde visite du Mont Tsuru.
description.italian: Recupera tutto il tuo equipaggiamento durante la tua seconda visita sul Monte Tsuru.
description.koreana: 두 번째 쓰루 산 방문 시, 모든 장비를 되찾으십시오.
description.spanish: Recupera todo tu equipo en tu segunda visita al monte Tsuru.
description.schinese: 在第二次访问都留山时收回所有设备。
description.tchinese: 在第二次訪問都留山時收回所有設備。
description.russian: Забрать всю свою амуницию во время второго визита на гору Цуру.
description.japanese: 装備を取り返してもう一度鶴山に向かう
description.polish: Odzyskaj wszystkie elementy wyposażenia podczas drugiej wizyty na górze Tsuru.
description.turkish: Tsuru Dağı'na ikinci ziyaretinde tüm ekipmanını geri al.
description.brazilian: Reclame todo o seu equipamento na sua segunda visita ao Monte Tsuru.

description.english: Lure a guard into Hayato's cell using his stone.
description.german: Locke eine Wache in Hayatos Zelle, indem du seinen Stein benutzt.
description.french: Attirer un garde dans la cellule de Hayato en utilisant sa pierre.
description.italian: Attira una guardia nella cella di Hayato usando una pietra.
description.koreana: 돌을 사용해 경비병을 하야토의 감방에 유인하십시오.
description.spanish: Usa la piedra para atraer a un guardia a la celda de Hayato.
description.schinese: 投掷石块将一名敌人引诱到隼人的囚笼中。
description.tchinese: 投擲石塊將一名敵人引誘到隼人的囚籠中。
description.russian: Заманить стражника в камеру Хаято при помощи камня.
description.japanese: 石を使って見張りをハヤトの牢へ誘い出す
description.polish: Zwab strażnika do celi Hayata, rzucając kamieniem.
description.turkish: Taş atarak Hayato'nun hücresine bir muhafız çek.
description.brazilian: Atraia um guarda para a cela de Hayato usando a pedra.

description.english: Hide in the wagon on your way up the Myōgi Pass.
description.german: Verstecke dich in einem Wagen auf deinem weg zum  Myōgi Pass.
description.french: Se cacher dans le chariot en chemin pour la Passe de Myōgi.
description.italian: Nasconditi nel carrello durante la risalita verso il Passo Myōgi.
description.spanish: Escóndete en el carro de camino al paso de Myōgi.
description.schinese: 在去妙义关口的时候，躲在货车内。
description.tchinese: 在去妙義關口的時候，躲在貨車內。
description.russian: Спрятаться в повозке на пути по тракту Мьеги.
description.japanese: 妙義峠に向かう荷馬車に隠れる
description.polish: Ukryj się na wozie podróżując w górę przełęczy Myōgi.
description.brazilian: Esconda-se na carroça a caminho da passagem de Myogi.

displayName.german: Gib dem Mond ein High Five

description.english: Climb the pagoda of the small temple at the Myōgi Pass.
description.german: Klettere auf die Pagode des kleinen Tempels beim Myōgi Pass.
description.french: Escalader la pagode du petit temple de la Passe de Myōgi.
description.italian: Arrampicati sulla pagoda del piccolo tempio al Passo Myōgi.
description.koreana: 묘기 도로에 있는 작은 사원의 석탑을 오르십시오.
description.spanish: Sube a la pagoda del pequeño templo en el paso de Myogi.
description.schinese: 爬上妙义关口上小寺庙里的宝塔。
description.tchinese: 爬上妙義關口上小寺廟裡的寶塔。
description.russian: Забраться на пагоду на малом храме у тракта Мьеги.
description.japanese: 妙義峠での小さい塔に登る
description.polish: Wdrap się na pagodę małej świątyni na przełęczy Myōgi.
description.turkish: Myōgi Geçidi'ndeki küçük tapınağın pagodasına tırman.
description.brazilian: Suba o pagode do pequeno templo na passagem de Myogi.

description.english: Light the bonfire at the Myōgi Pass.
description.german: Entfache das Feuer beim Myōgi Pass.
description.french: Allumer le feu de joie de la Passe de Myōgi.
description.italian: Accendi il falò al Passo Myōgi.
description.spanish: Enciende la hoguera del paso de Myogi.
description.schinese: 在妙义关口点燃篝火。
description.tchinese: 在妙義關口點燃篝火。
description.russian: Развести костер на тракте Мьеги.
description.japanese: 妙義峠でかがり火をたく
description.brazilian: Ilumine a fogueira ao ar livre na passagem de Myogi.

description.english: Take your revenge on Lord Noboru.
description.german: Nimm Rache an Fürst Noboru.
description.french: Vous venger du Seigneur Noboru.
description.italian: Esigi la tua vendetta su Lord Noboru.
description.spanish: Véngate de lord Noboru.
description.schinese: 向奴博鲁领主复仇。
description.tchinese: 向奴博魯領主復仇。
description.russian: Отомстить господину Нобору.
description.japanese: ノボルに復讐する
description.brazilian: Vingue-se do lorde Noboru.

description.english: Let Lord Noboru commit Seppuku.
description.german: Lass Fürst Noboru Seppuku begehen.
description.french: Laisser le Seigneur Noboru commettre Seppuku.
description.italian: Fai fare harakiri a Lord Noboru.
description.spanish: Deja que lord Noboru se haga el seppuku.
description.schinese: 让奴博鲁领主切腹自杀。
description.tchinese: 讓奴博魯領主切腹自殺。
description.russian: Позволить господину Нобору совершить сеппуку.
description.japanese: ノボルに切腹させる
description.turkish: Efendi Noboru'nun seppuku yapmasına izin ver.
description.brazilian: Deixe o lorde Noboru cometer haraquiri.

description.english: Make the ox kick the statue at Sunpu Castle.
description.german: Lass den Ochsen die Statue in Schloss Sunpu treten.
description.french: Pousser le bœuf à ruer dans la statue du Château de Sunpu.
description.italian: Fai scalciare la statua dal bue al Castello Sunpu.
description.koreana: 황소가 순푸 성의 석상을 발로 차게 하십시오.
description.spanish: Haz que el buey le dé una coz a la estatua del castillo de Sunpu.
description.schinese: 让牛在骏府城踢毁雕像。
description.tchinese: 讓牛在駿府城踢毀雕像。
description.russian: Заставить быка лягнуть статую в замке Сунпу.
description.japanese: 雄牛に駿府城の像を蹴らせる
description.polish: Spraw, by wół kopnął posąg w zamku Sunpu.
description.brazilian: Faça o boi dar um pontapé na estátua no castelo de Sunpu.

description.english: Shoot an enemy inside a warzone or a shooting range.
description.german: Erschieße einen Gegner auf einem Schlachtfeld oder beim Zielschießen.
description.french: Tirer sur un ennemi dans une zone de guerre ou sur un champ de tir.
description.italian: Uccidi un nemico all'interno di una zona di guerra o un poligono di tiro.
description.koreana: 전장 또는 사격장 내에서 적 1명을 쏘십시오.
description.spanish: Dispara a un enemigo dentro de una zona de guerra o un campo de tiro.
description.schinese: 在战地或射击场内射击敌人。
description.tchinese: 在戰地或射擊場內射擊敵人。
description.russian: Застрелить врага в боевой зоне или на стрельбище.
description.japanese: 間合いの中か射撃範囲内で敵を撃つ
description.polish: Zastrzel przeciwnika na polu bitwy lub na strzelnicy.
description.turkish: Bir savaş alanındaki veya bir atış menzilindeki bir düşmanı vur.
description.brazilian: Dispare em um inimigo dentro de uma zona de guerra ou em um campo de tiro.

description.english: Kill a chicken.
description.german: Töte ein Huhn.
description.french: Tuer un poulet.
description.italian: Uccidi un pollo.
description.spanish: Mata a un pollo.
description.schinese: 杀死一只鸡。
description.tchinese: 殺死一隻雞。
description.russian: Убить курицу.
description.japanese: 鶏を殺す
description.brazilian: Mate uma galinha.

description.english: Kill 11 chickens in one level.
description.german: Töte 11 Hühner in einem Level.
description.french: Tuer 11 poulets dans un seul niveau.
description.italian: Uccidi 11 polli in un livello.
description.spanish: Mata a 11 pollos en un nivel.
description.schinese: 在一个等级中杀死 X 只鸡。
description.tchinese: 在一個等級中殺死 X 只雞。
description.russian: Убить куриц (11 шт.) на одном уровне.
description.japanese: １つのステージで鶏を11羽殺す
description.brazilian: Mate 11 galinhas em um nível.

description.english: Run 500 meters with Kuma.
description.german: Laufe 500 Meter mit Kuma.
description.french: Courir sur 500 mètres avec Kuma.
description.italian: Corri per 500 metri con Kuma.
description.spanish: Corre 500 metros con Kuma.
description.schinese: 和熊一起跑 500 米。
description.tchinese: 和熊一起跑 500 米。
description.russian: Кума должен пробежать 500 м.
description.japanese: クマを500メートル走らせる
description.brazilian: Corra 500 metros com Kuma.

description.english: Kill all developers.
description.german: Töte das Entwickler-Team.
description.french: Tuer tous les développeurs.
description.italian: Uccidi tutti gli sviluppatori.
description.spanish: Mata a todos los desarrolladores.
description.schinese: 杀死所有的开发人员。
description.tchinese: 殺死所有的開發人員。
description.russian: Убить всех разработчиков.
description.japanese: ディベロッパーを倒す
description.brazilian: Mate todos os desenvolvedores.

description.english: Execute a plan with actions for all 5 characters.
description.german: Führe einen plan mit Aktionen von allen Charakteren aus.
description.french: Exécuter un plan avec des actions pour les 5 personnages.
description.italian: Esegui un piano assegnando azioni a tutti e 5 i personaggi.
description.koreana: 다섯 캐릭터 전원의 행동으로 계획을 실행하십시오.
description.spanish: Ejecuta un plan con acciones para los 5 personajes.
description.schinese: 执行一个计划，对五个角色展开行动。
description.tchinese: 執行一個計畫，對五個角色展開行動。
description.russian: Выполнить план, требующий участия всех 5 персонажей.
description.japanese: 5人すべてのキャラのアクションを使い計画を実行する
description.polish: Wykonaj plan z czynnościami przypisanymi wszystkim 5 postaciom.
description.turkish: Tüm 5 karaktere de eylem atayıp bir plan uygula.
description.brazilian: Realize um plano com ações dos 5 personagens.

description.english: Knock out 250 guards or samurai.
description.german: Schlage 250 Samurai oder Wachen bewusstlos.
description.french: Assommer 250 gardes ou Samouraïs.
description.italian: Stordisci 250 guardie o samurai.
description.spanish: Derriba a 250 guardias o samuráis.
description.schinese: 击倒250个守卫或武士。
description.tchinese: 擊倒250個守衛或武士。
description.russian: Нокаутировать стражу или самураев (250 чел.)
description.japanese: 見張りや侍を250人気絶させる
description.brazilian: Nocauteie 250 guardas ou samurais.

description.english: Kill 500 guards.
description.german: Töte 500 Wachen.
description.french: Tuer 500 gardes.
description.italian: Uccidi 500 guardie.
description.spanish: Mata a 500 guardias.
description.schinese: 杀死500个守卫。
description.tchinese: 殺死500個守衛。
description.russian: Убить стражу (500 чел.)
description.japanese: 見張りを500人殺す
description.brazilian: Mate 500 guardas.

description.english: Kill 1000 guards.
description.german: Töte 1000 Wachen.
description.french: Tuer 1000 gardes.
description.italian: Uccidi 1000 guardie.
description.spanish: Mata a 1000 guardias.
description.schinese: 杀死1000个守卫。
description.tchinese: 殺死1000個守衛。
description.russian: Убить стражу (1000 чел.)
description.japanese: 見張りを1000人殺す
description.brazilian: Mate 1000 guardas.

description.english: Kill 50 samurai.
description.german: Töte 50 Samurai.
description.french: Tuer 50 Samouraïs.
description.italian: Uccidi 50 samurai.
description.spanish: Mata a 50 samuráis.
description.schinese: 杀死50个武士。
description.tchinese: 殺死50個武士。
description.russian: Убить самураев (50 чел.)
description.japanese: 侍を50人殺す
description.brazilian: Mate 50 samurais.

description.english: Hide 250 bodies.
description.german: Verstecke 250 Körper.
description.french: Dissimuler 250 corps.
description.italian: Nascondi 250 cadaveri.
description.spanish: Oculta 250 cuerpos.
description.schinese: 隐藏250具尸体。
description.tchinese: 隱藏250具屍體。
description.russian: Спрятать трупы (250 шт.)
description.japanese: 死体を250体隠す
description.brazilian: Esconda 250 corpos.

description.english: Hide 750 bodies.
description.german: Verstecke 750 Leichen.
description.french: Dissimuler 750 corps.
description.italian: Nascondi 750 cadaveri.
description.spanish: Oculta 750 cuerpos.
description.schinese: 隐藏750具尸体。
description.tchinese: 隱藏750具屍體。
description.russian: Спрятать трупы (750 шт.)
description.japanese: 死体を750体隠す
description.brazilian: Esconda 750 corpos.

description.english: Knock out a guard by throwing another guard at them.
description.german: Schlage eine  Wache mit einer geworfenen Wache bewusstlos.
description.french: Assommer un garde en lui lançant un autre garde dessus.
description.italian: Stordisci una guardia scagliandogli contro un'altra guardia.
description.spanish: Derriba a un guardia lanzándole a otro guardia.
description.schinese: 通过投掷一个守卫击倒另一个守卫。
description.tchinese: 通過投擲一個守衛擊倒另一個守衛。
description.russian: Вывести стражника из строя, бросив в него другого стражника.
description.japanese: 見張りに見張りを投げて気絶させる
description.polish: Ogłusz strażnika, rzucając w niego innym strażnikiem.
description.turkish: Bir muhafızı üzerine başka bir muhafız atarak bayılt.
description.brazilian: Nocauteie um guarda lançando outro guarda contra ele.

description.english: Collect all badges.
description.german: Sammel alle Abzeichen
description.french: Gagner tous les badges.
description.italian: Raccogli tutte le medaglie.
description.spanish: Consigue todas las insignias.
description.schinese: 收集所有的徽章
description.tchinese: 收集所有的徽章
description.russian: Собрать все нашивки.
description.japanese: 全てのバッジを集める
description.brazilian: Reúna todas as insígnias

description.english: Your technique is magnificent.
description.german: Deine Technik ist herausragend.
description.french: Votre technique est magnifique.
description.italian: La tua tecnica è magnifica.
description.spanish: Tu técnica es impresionante.
description.schinese: 你的技术已经炉火纯青。
description.tchinese: 你的技術已經爐火純青。
description.russian: Ваша техника превосходна.
description.japanese: その腕は見事であった
description.brazilian: A sua técnica é magnífica.

description.english: Raise the secret idol of Mount Tsuru.
description.german: Erwecke den geheimen Götzen des Tsuru.
description.french: Révéler l'idole secrète du Mont Tsuru.
description.italian: Risveglia l'idolo segreto del Monte Tsuru.
description.koreana: 쓰루 산의 숨겨진 우상을 일으켜 세우십시오.
description.spanish: Alza el ídolo secreto del monte Tsuru.
description.schinese: 唤醒都留山的秘密幽灵。
description.tchinese: 喚醒都留山的秘密幽靈。
description.russian: Поднять тайного идола горы Цуру.
description.japanese: 鶴山で秘密の像を見つける
description.brazilian: Erga o ídolo secreto do Monte Tsuru.
